inclusion.criterion: PN dependency (unable to meet nutritional needs solely by enteral nutrition);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Present PNALD, as evidenced by two consecutive direct bilirubin > 3.0 mg/dL (at interval of one week);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Failed standard therapies to prevent the progression of liver disease: Avoiding overfeeding, reduction/removal of copper and manganese from PN, advancement of enteral feeding and the use of Ursodiol, if possible.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: At the time the diagnosis PNALD is made, the patient is expected to continue PN at least an additional 3 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any other cause of chronic liver disease (i.e., hepatitis B or C, cystic fibrosis, biliary atresia, or alpha 1 anti-trypsin deficiency etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: enrollment in any other clinical trial involving an investigational agent (unless approved by the designated physicians on the multidisciplinary team);
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Intent to transfer to another healthcare facility
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
